statements: UPDATE fake_accounts SET account_status='inactive', political_affiliation='None' WHERE account_id=101;
UPDATE fake_accounts SET account_type='bot', propaganda_content='This is fake news' WHERE account_id=203;
UPDATE fake_accounts SET account_type = 'Business', account_status = 'Active' WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE fake_accounts SET political_affiliation = 'Neutral', propaganda_content = 'Latest Updates' WHERE account_id = 456;
UPDATE fake_accounts SET username='john_doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE account_id=1;
UPDATE propaganda_posts SET post_content='Important message for all citizens!', is_propaganda=true WHERE post_id=5;
UPDATE fake_accounts SET email='newemail@example.com', is_fake=true WHERE account_id=123;
UPDATE propaganda_posts SET is_propaganda=false, post_content='Updated post content' WHERE post_id=456;
UPDATE Accounts SET is_fake = TRUE WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE Investigations SET outcome = 'Closed' WHERE investigation_id = 456;
UPDATE Accounts SET is_fake = TRUE, username = 'john_doe' WHERE account_id = 101;
UPDATE Posts SET post_date = '2022-05-15', post_content = 'Updated post content' WHERE post_id = 201;
UPDATE fake_accounts SET follower_count = 500 WHERE account_id = 123;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET is_promoted = true, post_content = 'Check out this amazing offer!' WHERE post_id = 456;
UPDATE propaganda_accounts SET follower_count = 5000 WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'New post content' WHERE post_id = 100;
UPDATE propaganda_accounts SET follower_count = 1000, creation_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE account_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content', post_date = '2022-02-15 08:30:00' WHERE post_id = 5;
